com.bienmesabe.rest.controller

Class RecipeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bienmesabe.rest.controller.RecipeController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="*",
             methods={GET,POST,PUT,DELETE})
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/recipe")
public class RecipeController
extends Object
    Controller for Recipes // url: http://localhost:8080/api/recipe
    Version:
    11/04/2021
    Author:
    RAUL RAMOS CENDRERO

      • getRecipes

        @GetMapping(value="/getRecipes")
public List<Recipe> getRecipes()
        Method to recover the recipes // HTTP verb: GET url: http://localhost:8080/api/recipe/getRecipes
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes

      • getRecipeByIngredients

        @GetMapping(value="/getRecipeByIngredients/{ingredients}")
public List<Recipe> getRecipeByIngredients(@PathVariable
                                                                                                       String ingredientsForFilter)
        Method to recover the recipes by ingredients // HTTP verb: GET url: http://localhost:8080/api/recipe/getRecipeByIngredients/{IngredientsList}
        Parameters:
        ingredientsForFilter - list with the ingredients that must have the recipe
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes in the DB filtered by ingredients

      • getRecipeByKCal

        @GetMapping(value="/getRecipesByKCal/{kcalMin}/{kcalMax}")
public List<Recipe> getRecipeByKCal(@PathVariable
                                                                                                int kcalMin,
                                                                                                @PathVariable
                                                                                                int kcalMax)
        Method to recover the recipes by KCAL range // HTTP verb: GET url: http://localhost:8080/api/recipe/getRecipesByKCal/{kcalMin}/{kcalMax}
        Parameters:
        kcalMin - integer that represents the mimimum kcal of the recipe to search
        kcalMax - integer that represents the maximum kcal of the recipe to search
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes in the DB filtered by kcal range

      • getRecipesByType

        @GetMapping(value="/getRecipesByType/{type}")
public List<Recipe> getRecipesByType(@PathVariable
                                                                                    int type)
        Method to recover the recipes by type // HTTP verb: GET url: http://localhost:8080/api/recipe/getRecipesByType/{RecipeType}
        Parameters:
        type - integer that represents the type of the recipe to search
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes in the DB filtered by type

        @GetMapping(value="/getRecipesByDinners/{dinners}")
public List<Recipe> getRecipesByDinners(@PathVariable
                                                                                             int dinners)
        Method to recover the recipes by type // HTTP verb: GET url: http://localhost:8080/api/recipe/getRecipesByType/{RecipeType}
        Parameters:
        dinners - integer that represents the dinners of the recipe to search
        Returns:
        a list with the recipes in the DB filtered by dinners

      • getRecipesById

        @GetMapping(value="/getRecipesById/{id}")
public Recipe getRecipesById(@PathVariable
                                                                        long id)
        Method to recover the recipe by id // HTTP verb: GET url: http://localhost:8080/api/recipe/getRecipesById/{RecipeId}
        Parameters:
        id - long that represents the id of the recipe to search
        Returns:
        the recipe in the DB filtered by id

      • getRecipesById

        @GetMapping(value="/getRecipesByFilters/{data}")
public List<Recipe> getRecipesById(@PathVariable
                                                                                     String data)
        Method to recover the recipe by received filters // HTTP verb: GET url: http://localhost:8080/api/recipe/getRecipesByFilters/{RecipeFilters} format of filter [typeOfFilter-filterValues]_[typeOfFilter-filterValues] ex: ingredients-10,11_kcal-200,250_type-21_dinners-1
        Parameters:
        data - string that contains all the filters to apply
        Returns:
        a list of recipes that complies with the filters recived by parameter

      • addUser

        @PostMapping(value="/addRecipe")
public Recipe addUser(Recipe recipe)
        Method to create the recipe // HTTP verb: POST url: http://localhost:8080/api/recipe/addRecipe
        Parameters:
        recipe - object that represents the recipe to persist
        Returns:
        the recipe object persisted or null if not

      • updateRecipe

        @PutMapping(value="/modifyRecipe")
public Recipe updateRecipe(Recipe recipe)
        Method to modify the recipe // HTTP verb: PUT url: http://localhost:8080/api/recipe/modifyRecipe
        Parameters:
        recipe - object that represents the recipe to modify
        Returns:
        the modified recipe

      • deleteRecipeById

        @DeleteMapping(value="deleteRecipeById/{id}")
public String deleteRecipeById(@PathVariable
                                                                              Long id)
        Method to delete the recipe by id // HTTP verb: DELETE url: http://localhost:8080/api/recipe/deleteRecipeById/{RecipeId}
        Parameters:
        id - long with the id of the recipe to delete
        Returns:
        an string that informs the id of the deleted recipe
